title: Company Overview
content: Stryker is a hydration-focused beverage brand in Bangladesh offering zero-sugar drinks. The company aims to promote a healthier lifestyle through modern branding and community-driven initiatives.

title: Startup Environment
content: Stryker operates with a fast-paced startup culture where employees take ownership and directly influence brand growth.

title: Company Culture
content: The company values transparency, collaboration, and respect. Employees are encouraged to share ideas regardless of role or seniority.

title: Learning Opportunities
content: Employees gain hands-on exposure to product development, brand marketing, and fitness-focused community projects.

title: Employee Wellbeing
content: Stryker promotes work-life balance through flexible work policies and team bonding activities.

title: Salary Review
content: Employees receive performance reviews after six months, with salary adjustments based on performance.

title: Wellness Programs
content: Team members can participate in wellness activities such as running clubs and yoga sessions.

title: Product Benefits
content: Employees receive unlimited access to Stryker beverages.

title: Team Activities
content: The company organizes team photoshoots, movie nights, and informal social events to strengthen team bonding.
